hero_description: Pupper Client is a Minecraft client optimized for PVP, providing smoother gameplay and better performance with a modern Windows 11 design philosophy.
feature1_description: Through advanced optimization techniques, significantly improve game frame rate and response speed, providing a smoother PVP experience.
feature2_description: Improved game visual effects, including clear hit markers, optimized particle effects and custom HUD elements.
feature3_description: Rich setting options allow you to adjust all aspects of the client according to personal preferences to create an exclusive gaming experience.
feature4_description: The development team continuously maintains and updates to ensure the client is compatible with the latest version of Minecraft and adds new features.
feature5_description: Strictly comply with Minecraft EULA, does not contain any cheating functions, ensuring your account security.
feature6_description: Join our active community to get support, share configurations and communicate with like-minded players.
footer_description: Pupper Client is a modern Minecraft PVP client focused on providing better gaming performance and user experience.
